review: This has been a great addition to our viewing technology. It makes it easy to get to Amazon Prime and Netflix shows and movies all in one.
author: Primary Teacher

review: This is so easy to set up and more than I thought it would be. Well worth the money.
author: michelle smith

review: Works awesome, I also own the Fire TV.  The Stick does everything at a lot cheaper price!
author: joseph k fitzsimmons

review: Zits the best of the best!!
author: Wesley Jordan

review: Very easy to set up and I have enjoyed watching mivues, documentaries, etc.  I wish that it could be updated more frequently.
author: Beverly Buckner
